text: Alloh ast, ki zaminro qarorgohi sumo soxt to dar on qaror gired va ʙar on zindagiro ʙarojaton mujassar kard va osmonro ʙaroi zamin cun ʙinoe ʙarafroxt. Va sumoro surat ʙaxsid va surathojatonro neku soxt. Va az cizhoi pokizavu xus ruzijaton dod. In ast Allohi ʙarhaq, ki ʙar sumo in ne'mathoro arzoni kard. Parvardigori sumost. Alloh purʙarakatu ʙuzurgvor ast, va az hama sifathoi nosoistae, ki loiqi zoti U nest, pok ast. Ust Parvardigori cahonijon
